scripts.test: npm run test:server -- && cd ui/ && npm test && cd ..
scripts.prettier: npm run prettier:server && cd ui/ && npm run prettier && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server; cd ui/ && npm run lint
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test LOG_LEVEL=error jest --env=node --runInBand --coverage common server && cd ui/ && npm run coverage && cd ..
scripts.clean: rm -rf coverage && cd ui/ && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.clobber: rm -rf coverage node_modules && cd ui/ && npm run clobber && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd ui/ && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build && cd ..
